titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Legal Aid Society (University of Michigan) records

did.unittitle: Legal Aid Society (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: Organization of University of Michigan law students staffing the Washtenaw Legal Aid Clinic under sponsorship of the United States Office of Economic Opportunity, the Washtenaw County Bar Association, and the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence, 1959-1967, and minutes, Sept.1965-Nov. 1966, of the executive council.

corpname.primary_name: Washtenaw County Legal Aid Society (Ann Arbor, Mich.)
